answers.author: David Carnahan
answers.text:
Hello Patricia, Palo Alto's Municipal Code explicitly prohibits license of the Seal and Logo to other organizations. It would be worth your time to check your communities MuniCode. http://goo.gl/d6lR9W

author: Patricia Himelberger
text: Has any municipality licensed its adopted town logo (not seal) for retail merchandising?
title: Licensing Town Logo
